description: Pendant of a blunt beaked bird in profile; long and curved tail; stylized linear indication of the detail features, incised on both sides identically; two perforations, one at the chest and one at the end of the tail. Translucent grey jade, calcified on one side, traces of red pigment (also on the calcified side); traces of clay;
medium: Translucent grey-brown jade with traces of red pigment
title: Pendant in the form of a Blunt Beaked Bird
